headline: How Governance Shifts And Mixed Growth Views Are Reshaping The J. M. Smucker (SJM) Story
summary: J. M. Smucker’s refreshed fair value point estimate of $123.44, up from $114.87, sits within a Street price target range that runs from $117 to $135. That reset lines up with research where some analysts lean into governance changes, activist involvement, and recent EPS strength, while others stay cautious and keep targets closer to the low $120s. As you read on, you will see how these differing views shape the evolving narrative and what it could mean for how you track the stock. Stay...

headline: Giant snack company closes key distribution centers, lays of 100s
summary: Shoppers at the grocery store often load their baskets with all kinds of snacks from one or more of the top producers who dominate the sector — Nestle, Pepsico, and Mondelez International. You can't miss Pepsico's products, which include Frito-Lay's Doritos, Cheetos, and Lay's potato chips, just to ...

headline: TD Cowen Sees Elliott Involvement Supporting Smucker’s (SJM) Long-Term Execution
summary: The J. M. Smucker Company (NYSE:SJM) is included among the 14 Value Stocks to Buy with High Dividend Yields. On February 27, TD Cowen raised its price recommendation on The J. M. Smucker Company (NYSE:SJM) to $124 from $112. It reiterated a Hold rating on the shares. The firm said the increase reflects its positive view […]
